quest.name: Merchant for a Day
journal: Baidur is not very good at his job.

dialogue.name: BAIDUR
dialogue.text: Oh, I am beginning to wonder if I will ever be able to sell my wares. I was so certain I could finally make a success of myself here as a trader...

dialogue.name: BAIDUR
dialogue.text: Ah, hello there. Tell me, have you ever tried your hand at running your own market stall?

dialogue.name: BAIDUR
dialogue.text: I myself have been struggling to sell much of anything of late. Observing someone else may be just what I need.

dialogue.name: BAIDUR
dialogue.text: Let me know if you feel up to the challenge.

dialogue.name: BAIDUR
dialogue.text: Are you willing to tend to my stall?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Tending to the merchant's stall will take several minutes. You may wish to cancel any pending Duty Finder registrations.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: BAIDUR
dialogue.text: That is a shame indeed. Please do speak with me again if you change your mind.

dialogue.name: BAIDUR
dialogue.text: Fantastic! I have a feeling I am going to learn a lot from observing you.

dialogue.name: BAIDUR
dialogue.text: I have always prided myself on having a varied assortment of goods for sale. There should be something here for every kind of customer. The best of luck to you!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Listen carefully to each customer and choose something you think will meet their needs.

dialogue.name: HOUSEWIFE02755
dialogue.text: Oh my, quite a selection of food you have. Let me think, yesterday we had fish... Trader, what would you recommend for a bunch of growing boys with healthy appetites?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Grilled fish.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Cheese.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Mammoth thigh.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: A tea brick.

dialogue.name: HOUSEWIFE02755
dialogue.text: Hmm, I am not so sure my boys would like that. I think I shall go and buy meat from another stall.

dialogue.name: HOUSEWIFE02755
dialogue.text: That does sound nice, doesn't it. I will take your finest mammoth thigh!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have failed to make a sale. It appears the customer did not appreciate your recommendation.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You made a sale! Nicely done.

dialogue.name: HAPPYBOY02755
dialogue.text: Give me a toy! Mummy said I could buy a toy because I've been good. I don't have much money so it should be something cheap. What can I buy?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: A wooden horse.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: A Kharaqiq board and pieces.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: A cheap wooden flute.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: A fancy multicolored doll.

dialogue.name: HAPPYBOY02755
dialogue.text: That sounds like lots of fun! Give it to me!

dialogue.name: HAPPYBOY02755
dialogue.text: It costs how much!? Mummy didn't give me that much money.

dialogue.name: HAPPYBOY02755
dialogue.text: A flute? I've never played one before but maybe Daddy can teach me. I'll take it!

dialogue.name: WORRIEDMAN02755
dialogue.text: Oh, I pine for that buxom maiden so, but I know not how to express my feelings. Whatever should I do?

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: I've got just the book for you.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Scream of your love to all of Reunion.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Good things come to handsome gents.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: You'll get nowhere with a face like that.

dialogue.name: WORRIEDMAN02755
dialogue.text: Sorry, did I look like I was soliciting advice? I was just heading home. I'll have you know I've a long night of crying myself to sleep ahead of me!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have failed to make a sale. It appears the customer did not appreciate your recommendation.

dialogue.name: WORRIEDMAN02755
dialogue.text: A book, you say? Pray tell me, just what is it called?

dialogue.name: Q5
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: A Beginner's Guide to Tumet Child Rearing.

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: Swim Like an Ejinn.

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: Adarkim Tactics: Advanced Edition.

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: Qalli Love Songs of Legend.

dialogue.name: WORRIEDMAN02755
dialogue.text: Are you mocking my love? There are other things I could be doing right now instead of taking your insults. I'll have you know I've a long night of crying myself to sleep ahead of me!

dialogue.name: WORRIEDMAN02755
dialogue.text: Love songs? Now that you mention it, I remember her saying she enjoyed music. I will take that book, thank you!

dialogue.name: FASHIONABLEGIRL02755
dialogue.text: Do you think this necklace suits me? I just bought it from that stall over there.

dialogue.name: Q6
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: Is that one of the eyes of Nidhogg!?

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: It looks lovely on you.

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: What a nice shade of scarlet.

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: We have even better jewelry here!

dialogue.name: FASHIONABLEGIRL02755
dialogue.text: Tell me then, just what would you suggest I buy?

dialogue.name: FASHIONABLEGIRL02755
dialogue.text: I am glad you think so! I fell in love with the color the moment I saw it and knew it had to be mine.

dialogue.name: FASHIONABLEGIRL02755
dialogue.text: In fact, I had actually planned on buying two pieces of jewelry today. Do you have anything for sale?

dialogue.name: Q7
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A7
dialogue.text: Scarlet earrings.

dialogue.name: A7
dialogue.text: A black bracelet.

dialogue.name: A7
dialogue.text: A ruby ring.

dialogue.name: A7
dialogue.text: A sapphire ring.

dialogue.name: FASHIONABLEGIRL02755
dialogue.text: Ah, those would go perfectly with my necklace! I will have them, thank you.

dialogue.name: FASHIONABLEGIRL02755
dialogue.text: That said, I am quite taken with this ruby ring as well... Give me both the earrings and this ring!

dialogue.name: FASHIONABLEGIRL02755
dialogue.text: Hmm, I am not so sure the color would suit me. It is awfully drab. No, I think that is enough shopping for today.

dialogue.name: FASHIONABLEGIRL02755
dialogue.text: That looks very nice indeed. I shall take it!

dialogue.name: FASHIONABLEGIRL02755
dialogue.text: That said, those scarlet earrings would go perfectly with my necklace... Give me both the ring and the earrings!

dialogue.name: BAIDUR
dialogue.text: I must say I am very impressed. I had no idea there was still so much I had to learn about trading.

dialogue.name: BAIDUR
dialogue.text: Up until now I had simply recommended whatever I thought was best. But it is clear that the customer's wishes should always be my top priority.

dialogue.name: BAIDUR
dialogue.text: Thank you for all your help.

dialogue.name: BAIDUR
dialogue.text: Perhaps you ought to rest for a while. It seems like this may all be a bit too much for you right now. Speak with me whenever you feel ready to try again.
